translations: n.（放圣餐面包的）金属制碟子

sentences.sentence: Patin said one cannot consider the evolution of music wire without looking at these other properties.
sentences.translation: 巴丁说，一个人不能不考虑这些其他的属性而只考虑音乐琴丝的演化。

sentences.sentence: Even with math models and calculations, there will never be an "ideal string" because of the physical parameters inherent to the piano, Patin said.
sentences.translation: 甚至利用数学模型和计算工具，也将不会有“理想琴丝”，因为物理参数是钢琴固有的，巴丁说。

sentences.sentence: Others working with pianos on a daily basis hold different views about music wire, said craftsman and piano builder Arno Patin, who owns a piano business in Ann Arbor, Mich.
sentences.translation: 日常中，其他钢琴相关领域的人对于琴丝持不同的观点， 手工艺人和钢琴制造者阿诺 巴丁说。
